description:
With financing from LFG reinstated, Miracle Entertainment is riding the momentum from Kiro`s appearance on the show. Meanwhile, Evolvers appear one after another around me. Plus, there`s the riddle of the mysterious organization "Black Swan." As my daily life slowly begins to change, I start investigating the topic of our next show, Key, a "hacker for justice" who`s name was in my father`s notebook.
Source: Crunchyroll
